display_name: Overall RDI all desats or arousal (SHHS2)
description: RDI at all desats or arousal  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas with arousal) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: rdi0pa = 60*(hremba +hroa + hnrba + hnroa +carba + caroa + canba + canoa +oarba +oaroa + oanba +oanoa) / slpprdp

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall RDI at 0% desat or arousal
